intro: Medicosma, commonly known as the "scented milkweed," is a genus of flowering plants belonging to the family Apocynaceae. These plants are characterized by their showy, often pink or purple flowers and milky sap, which is a common feature among members of the Apocynaceae family. Medicosma species are typically found in arid or semi-arid regions, thriving in well-drained soils. The leaves are usually opposite and ovate, with a slightly hairy texture. They are also known for their medicinal properties, which have been used in traditional herbal remedies.
